description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work spans topics like decentralization, digital landscapes, innovation, and societal changes in the digital age. He explores concepts such as ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and the evolution of technology's impact on society. yeehaa's courses cover breaking down silos, fostering innovation, and promoting open sharing in various fields.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforms education, advocates inclusive internet. Explores decentralization, digital landscapes, innovation. Unites people, translates visions into ecosystems. Courses on breaking silos, fostering innovation, open sharing.
